column5: The Gulf of Mexico is beautiful, and this first floor unit features views of the Gulf and the beautifully landscaped swimming pools. No need to get in an elevator or go down hallways to get to the pool and beach. Schlitterbahn, grocery stores and Port Aransas are only 10 minutes away. This one bedroom condominium has a king-sized bed in the bedroom, and two built in bunk beds in the living room. We also provide a queen-sized air bed. One of the pools is heated! Price includes 9% hotel tax.
